channel.title: Toggle between 2 tags
channel.description:
I'm trying to create an action to toggle between 2 possible tags. Basically, if a Draft has "tag1", I'd like to switch it to "tag2" and visa versa. I can't find anything in the Action Directory that does this (or something similar that I can hack around with). Can anyone suggest a plan of attack?
Thanks! Paul

item.title: Toggle between 2 tags
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
A script step like this should give you the basis for it I think.

let strTag = "foo";
if (draft.hasTag(strTag)) draft.removeTag(strTag);
else draft.addTag(strTag);
draft.update();

Just account for it not being one tag but two and so you need to do an add and remove each time.

But also what happens should you inadvertently have both or neither…?

Hope that helps.
